Class ModifyProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ModifyProductController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ModifyProductController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class contains the logic for the modification of products RUNTIME ERROR:

      void handleButtonAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the add button for associated parts If nothing is selected, display an alert
      void handleButtonCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Returns to the main scene without saving any changes
      void handleButtonRemove(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes a associated part from the product If nothing is selected, display an alert
      void handleButtonSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Saves the modified part and returns to the main scene Throws an alert if a condition is not met
      void handleTextFieldParts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the text field for parts Checks the part name, if nothing was found check the ID If nothing is still found, display an alert
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      Gets the data required to modify the product Sets all data for the table views as well as the observable lists
